response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. However, I understand everyone has different preferences and budgets. To make this opportunity appealing, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you. This is an exclusive offer just for you and could be your chance to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate. Would you like to proceed with this offer?", "product_price": 75}
